vlive.korean: [치... 한마디에 전 세계 인구 황현진 큐티 치사량으로 정신 잃어] 치... [His cute reaction will make people in the world pass out] Ha... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 기름 중에서 최고는? ❤️황현진 온리유❤️ (HYUNJIN’s funny comment reaction)
vlive.english: [His cute reaction will make people in the world pass out] Ha...

vlive.korean: [전세계 인구가 천국으로 이사와버렸는데] 오늘 여기 오신 소감이 어떠신가요? [all people in the world came to the heaven] How do you feel? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 콜드브루요? 요즘은 골드브루 아닌가요? (NCT DREAM talking about RUNJUN’s episode)
vlive.english: [all people in the world came to the heaven] How do you feel?

vlive.korean: [세상 깜찍한 질문에 치인 건 지구촌 77억 인구의 심장 뿐이라네요] 뭐 쳐드릴까요? [So cute that people with weak hearts need to be careful now] Can I play something? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [iKON] 요즘 락페스티벌 가면 비와 락앤롤로 오프닝 하잖아요☔️ (BOBBY&JU-NE singing with guitar)
vlive.english: [So cute that people with weak hearts need to be careful now] Can I play something?

vlive.korean: [그럼 전 77억 인구의 대변인으로서 전합니다 (세븐틴 귀여워)] 가장 시끄러운 멤버는? [I'm the spokesperson of 7.7 billion people] [SVT is so cute!] Who's the loudest one? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 💖나의 좌우명: 세븐틴의 귀여움은 늘 정답이다💙 (SEVENTEEN’s speed Q&A)
vlive.english: [I'm the spokesperson of 7.7 billion people] [SVT is so cute!] Who's the loudest one?

vlive.korean: [앓는 중 지금 전 세계 77억 인구가][네버엔딩] "어이없지 않아요?" [All of the world, 7.7 billion people, have lost their memories] [Never ending] "Isn't that unbelievable"? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [WINNER] 천하제일주접대회라고 쓰고 천하제일진심대회라고 읽습니다 (WINNER reading fans’ funny comments)
vlive.english: [All of the world, 7.7 billion people, have lost their memories] [Never ending] "Isn't that unbelievable"?
